SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Subscription ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VARA object" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_VARA#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "CONFIGURE_CONNECTION"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 7
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "--action" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "-cto" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-rto" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-sid" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "--keystore" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-pwd"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#, string, 7
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[1] = "&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[3] = "&UC4RB_AZR_READ_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[5] = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[7] = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Invoking java binary !java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CONFIGURE CONNECTION ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CONFIGURE CONNECTION ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: ! Publishing Connection info to VARA object if connection successful :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : PUT_VAR "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_VARA#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#" :ENDIF
